Cutscenes/Story Events/dying/dying/1: You gave us quite a scare.
Cutscenes/Story Events/dying/dying/2: Please take your health more seriously, [Ari].
Cutscenes/Story Events/dying/dying/3: You're lucky we found you by that dragon statue in the Mines.
Cutscenes/Story Events/dying/dying/4: Well, I'm glad you seem to be doing better. Let's get you home to rest.
